00045     public CitationScreen1(Citation _c){
00046         super(NO_VERTICAL_SCROLL);
00047         
00048         cs1 = this;
00049         
00050         // String bgImage = "img/badge.png";    
00051         // final Bitmap _backgroundBitmap = Bitmap.getBitmapResource(bgImage);  
00052         
00053         VerticalFieldManager verticalManager = null;
00054 
00055         //rather than  adding component in the mainScreen add components
00056         //in this verticalManager and then add this manager to mainScreen  
00057         verticalManager = new VerticalFieldManager(Manager.VERTICAL_SCROLL | Manager.VERTICAL_SCROLLBAR);
00058 
00059         this.add(verticalManager);        
00060               
00061         c = _c;
00062         
00063         LabelField lf1 = new LabelField("OREGON UNIFORM CITATION & COMPLAINT", LabelField.ELLIPSIS | LabelField.USE_ALL_WIDTH | DrawStyle.HCENTER)
00064         {
00065             protected void paintBackground(net.rim.device.api.ui.Graphics g) 
00066             { 
00067                 g.clear(); 
00068                 g.getColor(); 
00069                 g.setColor(Color.GREEN); 
00070                 g.fillRect(0, 0, Display.getWidth(), Display.getHeight()); 
00071                 g.setColor(Color.WHITE);                
00072             } 
00073         };
00074         FontFamily fontFamily[] = FontFamily.getFontFamilies(); 
00075         Font font1 = fontFamily[1].getFont(FontFamily.CBTF_FONT, 14); 
00076         lf1.setFont(font1);              
00077         setTitle(lf1);

00141     public static class ButtonListener implements FieldChangeListener {
00142         Citation c;
00143         CitationScreen1 cs1;
00144                     
00145         public ButtonListener(CitationScreen1 _cs1, Citation _n1){
00146             cs1 = _cs1;
00147             c = _n1;
00148         }
00149                     
00150         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00151             ButtonField btn4 = (ButtonField) field;
00152             if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Create New"){
00153                 c = CitationStore.getNewCitation();
00154                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(UiApplication.getUiApplication().getActiveScreen());
00155                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen1(c));
00156                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen2(c));
00157             }
00158         }
00159     }      
00160      
00164     private MenuItem createNew = new MenuItem("New", 110, 10) {
00165         public void run()
00166         {                         
00167             c = CitationStore.getNewCitation();
00168             UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(UiApplication.getUiApplication().getActiveScreen());
00169             UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen1(c));
00170             UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen2(c));
00171         }
00172     };
00173 
00177     private MenuItem openPrev = new MenuItem("Open", 110, 11) {
00178         public void run() {
00179             int index = list.getSelectedIndex();
00180             c = CitationStore.getCitationByIndex(index);    
00181             if (c == null){
00182                 Dialog.inform("Failed to open.");
00183                 return;
00184             }
00185             if (c.isReadOnly()) {
00186                 // skip to preview screen if citation has already been printed or submitted
00187                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen9(c));
00188             }
00189             else {
00190                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen2(c));                    
00191             }
00192         }
00193     };
00194     
00198     private MenuItem delPrev = new MenuItem("Delete", 110, 11) {
00199         public void run() {
00200             //Dialog.inform("Removing citation...");
00201             int index = list.getSelectedIndex();
00202             CitationStore.Remove(index);
00203             UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(UiApplication.getUiApplication().getActiveScreen());
00204             UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen1(c));
00205         }
00206     };
00207 
00208 }

00215 final class TestListCallback implements ListFieldCallback {
00216     public Citation _controller;
00217     
00223     public TestListCallback (){
00224         _controller = new Citation();
00225     }
00226     
00233     public void drawListRow(ListField list, Graphics g, int index, int y, int w) {
00234         int count = CitationStore.getCitationCount();
00235         if(index >= count){
00236             return;
00237         }
00238   
00239         _controller = CitationStore.getCitationByIndex(index);   
00240         g.drawText("Citation # " + String.valueOf(index), 0, y, DrawStyle.LEFT, w);
00241     }
00242     
00249     public Object get(ListField listField, int index) {
00250         return (Object)CitationStore.List.elementAt(index);
00251     }
00252     
00259     public int getPreferredWidth(ListField listField) {
00260         return Graphics.getScreenWidth();
00261     }
00262     
00268     public int indexOfList(ListField listField, String prefix, int start) {
00269         return listField.indexOfList(prefix, start);
00270     }
00271 }
